Muncie.Alva Kitselman House: Alva Kitselman House, also known as "Hazelwood" and Hazelwood Christian Church, is a historic home located at Muncie, Delaware County, Indiana. It was built in 1915, and is a 2 1/2-story, "L"-plan, Colonial Revival style brick mansion. It features a central portico with Ionic order columns and consists of a hipped roof main block with 2 1/2-story rear service wing.
